2025-12-09T08:08:00.8280982Z [36;1m[0m

2025-12-09T08:08:00.8281638Z [36;1mif [ -d public ]; then cp -R public deploy/public; fi[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8281953Z [36;1mmkdir -p deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8282271Z [36;1mcp -R .next/static/. deploy/.next/static[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8282524Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8282798Z [36;1mcp staticwebapp.config.json deploy/staticwebapp.config.json[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8283132Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8283394Z [36;1mecho "--- 3. DEPENDÊNCIAS DE PRODUÇÃO NO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8283719Z [36;1mnpm ci --omit=dev --prefix deploy[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8283955Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8284148Z [36;1mecho "--- 4. OTIMIZAÇÃO DO ARTEFATO ---"[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8284525Z [36;1m# Mantemos os binários Debian do Prisma (compatíveis com o runner do SWA)[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8284938Z [36;1m# e removemos apenas arquivos grandes ou não usados.[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8285276Z [36;1mbash scripts/prune-deploy-artifact.sh deploy[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8285545Z [36;1m[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8285755Z [36;1m# AÇÃO EXTRA: Esvaziar pasta Public da FUNCTION[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8286186Z [36;1m# (Os arquivos estáticos já foram subidos para o CDN na etapa de build padrão)[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8286659Z [36;1m# A Function não precisa dos vídeos MP4/MOV, apenas o navegador precisa.[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8287042Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mp4" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8287329Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.mov" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8287612Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.jpg" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8287893Z [36;1mfind deploy/public -name "*.png" -delete[0m
2025-12-09T08:08:00.8288311Z [36;1m[0m
